title: The Overreaction Episode! + Fantasy Fallacies, BOOM-tacular - Fantasy Football Podcast for 5/19
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason each pick “Overreactions” for the 2022 season. Which players will be drafted too high or too low in fantasy football drafts? Plus, which team situations are toughest to predict for the pass catchers? Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for May 19th, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is available for pre-order at UltimateDraftKit.com -- Get instant access to the Dynasty Pass with the UDK+

(02:05) - Quick Question - Tricky Predictions
(08:05) - NFL News
(13:50) - Overreactions
(15:00) - Joe Burrow
(20:35) - Upside TEs
(24:40) - QB Rushing Upside
(29:35) - James Conner Doubt
(33:30) - New WRs with Old QBs
(38:40) - WRs with New Teammates

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
